name: Elder
text: Are you sure you are ready for this?

name: Elder
text: If so, show me what you've learned

name: Elder
text: Now, press the arrow keys to move around

name: Elder
text: Hooray, you figured out how to move around!!

name: Elder
text: Hooray, you figured out how to swing a sword!!

name: Elder
text: Now, press K to dodge attacks

name: Elder
text: Hooray, you figured out how to dodge!!

name: Elder
text: Honestly, that's all I've really got

name: Elder
text: Now please, set forth on your adventure
